item.description:
View the Official Story at home (before the Tertulia), watch a scene together at the Tertulia, and then we'll discuss it in Spanish. You can find the movie at video stores, on Netflix, or in many local libraries. Bring food to share while we chat.

"A description of the movie is as follows: Allicia es una profesor de hisotoria casada con un empresario que habia tenido conexiones con militares durante la dictadure en Argentina (la guerra sucia). Alicia y Roberto tienen una hija adoptive, Gabi. A pesar de la resistencia de Roberto, Alicia quiere saber el origen de su hija. Esta investigacion la llevara a descubrir no solamente la historia de su hija sino tambien lo que ocurrio en el pais durante la dictadure."

Alicia is a history professor married to a businessman who had connections to the military during the dictatorshop in Argentina (The Dirty War). Alicia and Roberto had an adopted daughter,Gabi. Despite Roberto's resistance, Alicia qanted to know the origin of her daughter. This research led her to discover not only her daughter's history but also what occurred in the country during the dictatorship.

A full description of the movie by Roger Ebert is available on the website below:

http://rogerebert.sun...
